item.title: SD Cards
item.description: Why have an EMMC at all When we started with TAOS we were trying to run on x86 laptops. The one we had focused on was a laptop that had eMMC storage, so since eMMC is basically a fancy SD card, The first thing I worked on was an SD card driver that could read and write blocks to unblock the file system people. Setting Up the driver
